title: Factions: Crescendo
description: “…humanity is really just a depraved state of mind. If they don’t have a leader to divide evil from good, they would destroy each other anyway.” – CatherIs this merely justification from a power-mad leader, or the true nature of humankind? It’s up to Diedrick Hale to prove which is true….Factions: Crescendo is the second volume in the Factions series, picking up where Coup d’Etat passed the torch. Flawed immortals continue to lead warring factions of human survivors in the ravaged, post-apocalyptic city of Axis, where new plots and alliances are shifting the balance of power, and a final conflict is rapidly approaching. But will this battle stop the war or continue it in a twisted web of corrupt bloodlines?Guns, swords and sorcery and genetic alteration are the tools of this urban fantasy, as Diedrick and his comrades struggle to stay alive, stay true to themselves, and end the war for good.
author: Marian R. York
